ingredients.content: 4 ½ oz carrots, cut into pieces (approx. 1 carrot)
11 ½ oz freshly squeezed orange juice

preparations.content: Place carrots into mixing bowl and chop <b>10 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add orange juice, mango, turmeric, cayenne and ice cubes and blend <b>1 min 30 sec/speed 10<b>. Serve immediately.
